::Zardus::

Zardus narrows his eyes, watching Battera storm off. He looks back at 
Lady Hawk, frowning.

"As I said before, outside rank matters little. Unless you have an 
army at your back. I would watch myself if I were you. Battera is 
higher rank than you while you're in your base, for now at least."

He resumes his walk toward the lab. This bot was starting to annoy 
him. He enters the lab, looking at Squizzy and Feline.

"Feline, can you launch program 2393a? It will start the 
reprogramming procedure for this bot. I will come back to finish it 
up."

He turns to Lady Hawk. "There is another lab through this door," he 
says, walking over to the door and opening it, revealing an identical 
lab, "What exactly did you want to show me?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "You must certainly teach her some manners, it isn't every day you 
> will recieve guests such as myself. Lady Hawk told Zardus as they 
> proceeded through the halls. She fealt almost insulted 
> by the way Battera stormed away without the courtesy of 
acknowleging 
> her before she left.
